Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), cmake, googletest, libarchive-dev, libbz2-dev, libcurl4-gnutls-dev | libcurl4-openssl-dev, libcxx-serial-dev, libdrm-dev, libelf-dev, libexif-dev, libgdk-pixbuf-2.0-dev, libglew-dev, libgtk-3-dev, libjs-highlight.js, libjs-mathjax, liblz4-dev, liblzma-dev, libpango1.0-dev, libsqlite3-dev, libssl-dev, libtinyxml-dev, libudev-dev, libunarr-dev, libusb-1.0-0-dev, libwxsvg-dev (>= 2:1.5.21), libwxgtk3.2-dev | libwxgtk3.0-gtk3-dev, libwxgtk-webview3.2-dev | libwxgtk-webview3.0-gtk3-dev, lsb-release, portaudio19-dev, rapidjson-dev
